diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, Aplastic anemia, Cellulitis with loculated fluid collection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with pancytopenia, splenomegaly, lymphadenopathy, and infection. A detailed examination ruled out various causes of pancytopenia. Further investigation showed atypical lymphoid cells in the bone marrow indicative of hairy-cell leukemia, supported by the presence of the BRAF V600E mutation.
